origin.origins-classes.wind_mage.name: Wind Mage
power.origins-classes.wind_mage/arcane_c: Activate this mode to open your grimoire, channeling its ancient energies to cast spells. Spells cannot be cast without the grimoire open. [Shift + Right-Click]
power.origins-classes.wind_mage/gust_bla: Sends a slicing blade of wind towards an enemy, dealing damage and knocking them back.
text.actionbar.wind_mage.gust_blade.spel: The air slices forward as you cast Gust Blade!
The air fails to respond; your Gust Blade dissolves into a mere breeze.
power.origins-classes.wind_mage/veil_of_: Conceal your true Aeroquint strength from others. Initially requires focus to maintain, but with mastery, it can be sustained passively.
text.actionbar.wind_mage.aeroquint.wake_: You awaken with the whispering winds revitalizing your spirit. Your Aeroquint flows fully restored.
